tags: random

I‚Äôve wanted to commit to, on the regular, updating and maintaining my site with new content whether it be small sketches embedded in my blog, or just my thoughts on any particualr topic that interests me. It‚Äôll also, ideally, help me to develop as a writer, teach me through experience to put my thoughts to words.
